text:
"Even if you didn't know..."

"Would you like me to quote some statistics?"

passages.full_quote: <used>Even if you didn't</used> actually hit them you would certainly set off their burglar alarms, which wouldn't be turned off again till after the weekend
"That was me, too," continued the voice in a low menacing rumble, "as <used>if you didn't know..." "Know</used>?"

passages.fragment: know ... '' `` Would you like me to
passages.source_name: So Long And Thanks For All The Fish
passages.full_quote: "I wonder, do you <used>know..." "Would you like me to</used> show you," said Wonko the Sane, "the sandals"

passages.fragment: Would you like me to quote some statistics ?
passages.full_quote: <used>Would you like me to quote some statistics</used>?
